K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-1: mah'a k'a shya pa s'u tra /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-4: 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-6: rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka landa ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po pi bya la'i phug na bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-8: nad dam pos gzir zhing sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das srod la'i dus su so sor thams cad rtog cing bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs te gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-11: bzhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:438b-13: khyod ji ltar bza' ba 'dod dam /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-2: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs kyis mi zhi ba ma yin no //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-6: btung ba la mi sred par gyur /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-7: bdag nad dam pos gzir bar gyur te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-10: zhi bar byed pa'i thabs mdzad du gsol /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-11: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po 'di ngas legs par bshad par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-12: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-15: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-17: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 'di /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-19: ngas yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-20: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-23: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-25: ngas chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-26: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-29: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-31: ngas brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-32: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439a-35: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-0: ngas dga' @439b ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-1: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-4: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-5: yang 'od srung; ngas shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-6: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-9: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-11: ngas ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-12: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-14: byang chub pa dang; mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-16: ngas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-17: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-20: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-22: 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te ngas bshad do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-23: de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-26: mya ngan las 'das par gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-27: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag la bslab par bya'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:439b-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-0: de ma thag tu nad zhi bar @440a *//
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po langs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i nang zhi bar gyur to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-4: gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i mdo rdzogs so;; ;;pandi ta chen po a'a nanta shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-5: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa; gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-028:440a-6: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang /
